20110111025407.000|20110111025407.000|CC1|            by helping

20110111025409.000|20110111025409.000|CC1|      from sticking together

20110111025422.000|20110111025424.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke.

20110111025434.000|20110111025435.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.
